trminator
Class TRminatorApp

java.lang.Object
  trminator.TRminatorApp

public class TRminatorApp
extends java.lang.Object

TRminatorApp is the main application of the TRminator. It provides the user with access to both the graphical and command-line interfaces, and is where the command-line interface is defined.

Author:
jhoule

Constructor Detail

TRminatorApp

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
the main function of TRminatorApp is to kick off the CLI or the GUI for the user, and pass the arguments (save the interface definition) to that user interface. It does not require command-line-arguments, but can take them. If no arugments are provided, or the first is "-gui" the GUI is kicked off. If the first arg is "-cli," the command-line interface is kicked off, and subsequent args are sent to it.

Parameters:
args - - the command-line arguments.

getMode

private static int getMode(java.lang.String str)
getMode returns an int that the UI mode can be identified by. It searches the modes array for the string passed.

Parameters:
str - - the string for the desired mode.
Returns:
the int that corresponds with the mode, or -1 if it's not a known mode.
